com.yahoo.labs.samoa.moa.classifiers.core.driftdetection

Class AbstractChangeDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.moa.AbstractMOAObject
      • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.moa.options.AbstractOptionHandler
        • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.moa.classifiers.core.driftdetection.AbstractChangeDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.github.javacliparser.Configurable, ChangeDetector, MOAObject, OptionHandler, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ADWINChangeDetector, CusumDM, DDM, EDDM, EWMAChartDM, GeometricMovingAverageDM, PageHinkleyDM

    public abstract class AbstractChangeDetector
extends AbstractOptionHandler
implements ChangeDetector
    Abstract Change Detector. All change detectors in MOA extend this class.
    Version:
    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Albert Bifet (abifet at cs dot waikato dot ac dot nz)
